channel.title: Rest on Franziskus Domig
channel.description: Recent content in Rest on Franziskus Domig

item.title: Symfony 1.2 introduces REST
item.description: As Fabien just posted on the Symfony Blog the next major release of Symfony – Symfony 1.2 – will introduce a quite cool feature to the framework. It will be possible to add a hidden form element to add REST inforrmation to the form and get the REST state with sfRequest::getMethod(). This is quite useful and adds native support for PUT and DELETE from the browser.
